A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want to start off by saying I am a die hard Star Wars Fan. This movie is a disappointment plain and simple for any real fan. Plot development is good\, but where we seek answers from the last movie into this one we are left with dissapointment. No proper closure. This maybe a great film for those who aren't fan of the series who will see action\, and comedy. However if you are truly seeking a star wars experience this is not it. I rather live in my fandom universe then the one they presented.
